definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: Phosphor changes indium chip to need more than silicon chip second precipitate and etch.
sentences.chinese: 磷化铟晶片比硅片需要更屡次的积淀和蚀刻。

sentences.english: Does electronical computer based on microprocessors made of silicon chip come to an end?
sentences.chinese: 以硅片微处理器为核心的电子计算机要走到尽头了吗？

sentences.english: The harder you press the silicone against the acrylic, the more light comes out.
sentences.chinese: 硅片挤压丙烯酸层越剧烈，越多的光线就会放射出来。

sentences.english: You still have a single piece of silicon that plugs into the socket on your board.
sentences.chinese: 插入到主板插座上的硅片仍然是一片。

sentences.english: Normally silicon wafers are cut from a larger piece of silicon.
sentences.chinese: 通常硅片是由一片较大的硅切割而成的。

sentences.english: The method is to coat a wafer of silicon with a protective layer of silicon dioxide .
sentences.chinese: 其方法是往硅片上涂上一层二氧化硅防护膜。

sentences.english: The different distributions of kings of the damage and influence on the mechnical strength are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了不同损伤类型的分布及对硅片机械强度的影响。

sentences.english: The silicon panel was assembled with a mixed twisted nematic and birefringence liquid crystal cell.
sentences.chinese: 硅片上安装着混合扭曲向列型和双折射液晶盒。

sentences.english: By the halfwidth of rocking curve we can estimate the bending stress of silicon wafer.
sentences.chinese: 从双晶衍射半峰宽值可以评估硅片的抗弯强度。

sentences.english: The invention provides a silicon wafer cross-connecting device and a silicon wafer cross-connecting method thereof.
sentences.chinese: 本发明提供了一种硅片交接装置及其硅片交接方法。

sentences.english: The invention provides a silicon wafer cross-connecting device and a silicon wafer cross-connecting method thereof.
sentences.chinese: 本发明提供了一种硅片交接装置及其硅片交接方法。

sentences.english: China now produces one-third of the world's silicon wafers.
sentences.chinese: 中国目前的硅片产量占全球总产量的三分之一。

sentences.english: The company pioneered the use of the silicon chip.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司首先使用硅片。

sentences.english: Reclaim is defined as the removal of several microns of the silicon wafer and subsequent re-polishing of the wafer surface.
sentences.chinese: 回收硅片即将硅片削去几微米，再对其表面进行磨光。

sentences.english: Reclaim is defined as the removal of several microns of the silicon wafer and subsequent re-polishing of the wafer surface.
sentences.chinese: 回收硅片即将硅片削去几微米，再对其表面进行磨光。
